sentence.Network_en: No one knows whether a child's tendency towards fatness is inherited or due to the food he eats.
sentence.Network_cn: 没人知道儿童的发胖倾向是遗传还是食物造成的。

sentence.Network_en: She made a crack about his fatness.
Suitable for: people with simple obesity, post - natal fatness, hereditary obesity, middleageoverweight.
sentence.Network_cn: 相宜人群: 单纯性肥胖 、 产后肥胖 、 遗传性肥胖 、 中年性肥胖等人群.

entry.def: If you say that a person or animal is fat, you mean that they have a lot of flesh on their body and that they weigh too much. You usually use the word fat when you think that this is a bad thing.

example.ex: I could eat what I liked without getting fat...
After five minutes, the fat woman in the seat in front of me was asleep.
example.tran: 5分钟后，我前排座位上的胖女人便睡着了。

entry.def: Fat is the extra flesh that animals and humans have under their skin, which is used to store energy and to help keep them warm.

example.ex: Because you're not burning calories, everything you eat turns to fat.
example.tran: 由于没有消耗卡路里，你吃的所有东西都会变成脂肪。

entry.def: Fat is a solid or liquid substance obtained from animals or vegetables, which is used in cooking.

example.ex: When you use oil or fat for cooking, use as little as possible.
example.tran: 烹调时不论是植物油还是动物油，都要尽量少用。

example.ex: ...vegetable fats, such as coconut oil and palm oil.
example.tran: 椰子油和棕榈油一类的植物油

entry.def: Fat is a substance contained in foods such as meat, cheese, and butter which forms an energy store in your body.

example.ex: An easy way to cut the amount of fat in your diet is to avoid eating red meats...
example.tran: 减少饮食中脂肪摄入量的简单方法就是避免吃红肉。

example.ex: Most low-fat yogurts are about 40 calories per 100g.
example.tran: 大多数低脂酸奶每100克约含40卡热量。

entry.def: A fat object, especially a book, is very thick or wide.

example.ex: ...'Europe in Figures', a fat book published on September 22nd...
example.tran: 9 月 22 日出版的大部头书《数说欧洲》

example.ex: He took out his fat wallet and peeled off some notes.
example.tran: 他掏出鼓鼓的钱包，抽出几张钞票。

entry.def: A fat profit or fee is a large one.

example.ex: They are set to make a big fat profit.
example.tran: 他们下定决心要大赚一笔。

entry.def: If you say that there is fat chance of something happening, you mean that you do not believe that it will happen.

example.ex: 'Would your car be easy to steal?' — 'Fat chance. I've got a device that shuts down the gas and ignition.'
example.tran: “你的汽车容易被盗吗？”——“不太可能。有个装置，可关闭油门和点火开关。”

entry.tran: (靠…)发财，致富，大发横财，肥起来
entry.def: If you say that a person or organization has grown fat on something, you mean that they have become very rich as a result of it.

example.ex: Liverpool grew fat on the basis of the slave trade.
example.tran: 利物浦是靠奴隶贸易肥起来的。

entry.tran: 无济于事;于事无补;毫无用处
entry.def: If you say that something is a fat lot of good or a fat lot of help, you are saying rudely that it is no good or no help at all.

example.ex: 'I think we should go in and hammer them.' — 'And a fat lot of good that would do us.'
example.tran: “我觉得我们应该进去把他们狠揍一顿。”——“那对我们有个屁用。”

sentences.sentence: "she found fatness disgusting in herself as well as in others"

auth_sentence.content: Every child, regardless of fatness, has somehow won an athletic trophy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every child, regardless of fatness, has somehow won an athletic trophy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every child, regardless of fatness, has somehow won an athletic trophy.

auth_sentence.content: Studies of twins who've been raised apart attribute almost two-thirds of the difference in body fatness to genetic factors.
auth_sentence.res_content: Studies of twins who've been raised apart attribute almost two-thirds of the difference in body fatness to genetic factors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Studies of twins who've been raised apart attribute almost two-thirds of the difference in body fatness to genetic factors.

auth_sentence.content: Not sure of the details there but it seems that ferility is sometimes impeded by fatness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not sure of the details there but it seems that ferility is sometimes impeded by fatness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not sure of the details there but it seems that ferility is sometimes impeded by fatness.
